newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turk domestic debt up to 2,376 trln lira end-July.
newsitem.headline: Turk domestic debt up to 2,376 trln lira end-July.

text.p: Turkey's domestic debt rose to 2,376 trillion lira at end-July from 1,125 trillion lira in the corresponding 1995 period, the treasury said on Tuesday.
It said outstanding debt was 2,184 trillion lira at end-June.
The end-July debt included 1,510 trillion lira in t-bills and 626 trillion lira in government bonds, which has at least one-year maturities.
Turkey's domestic debt was 1,361 trillion lira at end-1995.
